sub_title: üì≤ Courses AI for Online Marketing & Coaching | International Online Teacher Czech, German, Spanish, English, Dutch
summary:
‚ú®Ô∏èQualified international language teacher with more than 25 years of experience in teaching.
QUALIFICATION FOR TEACHING LANGUAGES: 

1/ Ministry of Education, Culture and Science of the Czech Republic, university master

2/ Ministry of Education, Youth and Science of The Netherlands, teaching all grades of schools

3/ CRKBO certification, freelance language tutor registered in the Dutch Register for Professional Education (The Netherlands and Belgium)

4/ Active member of Czech AUƒåCJ (Association of the Teachers Czech as a second language)

My State Teacher Status (QTS) qualify me to teach in all kinds and levels of Dutch and Czech state schools, in a professional or secondary vocational education and in adult education. International language education.

BUSINESS LANGUAGES

Years of German teaching experience at Business Schools in the Czech Republic and in The Netherlands

Student post gradual Master of Business Administration (MBA), Marketing, International Relations, Management

Member of an international entrepreneuring community, USA. Courses and further education for language teachers

20 years experience in the international tourism industry and in international (online) retail - fashion, luxury brands jewellery.

INTERNATIONAL TEACHING

Polyglot. I speak 10 languages and can switch between them without any problems. I can teach it to you as well!

International teaching experience in:
1/ Spain (teaching German, State School EOI, EU grant for teachers)
2/ Germany (group courses Czech)
3/ United Kingdom (Primary School, assistant)
4/ The Netherlands (Primary School BO - gifted children, Secondary Vocational Education MBO, In-Company Courses, personal tutoring HAVO, VWO)
5/ the Czech Republic (High School, State Business Academy, In-Company)

Online also: Belgium (NHA students), USA (university), UK (Czech for bilingual kids) and Russia (exam for permanent stay, language school)

Teaching 5 languages in 6 other languages - 30 language combinations. 


INTERNATIONAL STUDY

GERMANY - University Halle, University Dortmund, University Augsburg: German Philology and literature,  C1-C2

SPAIN - Universidad Jaen (Spanish Philology), Universidad Jaen (Erasmus Course ELE Spanish, B1-B2)

UNITED KINGDOM - English as a second language, C1, 
au-pair in an English family

THE NETHERLANDS - NT2, Dutch as a second language

CZECH REPUBLIC - gymnasium and university study


CZECH LANGUAGE

School teacher Czech for Natives and tutor Czech for foreigners.
I am also a corrector Czech texts for Czech native speakers, university texts and for foreigners incl. C2, C1.
